alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued June 27 at 3:01AM MST until June 28 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 8 PM MST TUESDAY FOR STRONG WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND DRY FUELS FOR NORTHEAST MARICOPA AND SOUTHERN GILA COUNTIES... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR NORTHEAST MARICOPA AND SOUTHERN GILA COUNTIES... * AFFECTED AREA...Southern Gila County/Tonto National Forest Foothills. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 7 percent. * IMPACTS...Fuels are dry and fire danger is high. These conditions combined with low relative humidity and strong winds will lead to widespread hazardous fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring or are imminent. A combination of strong winds and low relative humidities can contribute to extreme fire behavior. Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this red flag warning. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings. Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this fire weather watch.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila County, Tonto National Forest Foothills
